• Infrastructure

    In China, 21Vianet’s operation of Microsoft Azure is an independently managed, publicly-owned cloud platform on Mainland China and is physically and logically independent of Microsoft Cloud-managed Azure services in other regions worldwide. 21Vianet uses Microsoft global Azure technology to provide clients globally consistent services with guaranteed quality. All client data and the handling of their data applications is carried out by 21Vianet online data centers wholly located in China. The data centers are positioned in Eastern China and Northern China, geographically separated by over 1,000 kilometers to provide Geo-replication and business continuity support enabling data reliability for Azure services.

  • With respect to network access, 21Vianet managed Microsoft Azure data centers use BGP to directly connect to major telecommunications carriers’ (China Telecom, China Unicom, and China Mobile) provincial-level core network nodes to provide high-speed, stable network access. The data centers located in Eastern and Northern China use identical broadcast addresses and BGP routing policies so that users can use their nearest access for Azure services from these data centers to reach optimum network performance.

  • All data centers choose a top node data center from a telecommunications carrier in China, and on the basis of green energy, can use N+1 or 2N uninterruptible power supply protection. In addition, there are also high-power diesel generators to provide backup power to the data centers with on-site diesel storage and nearby supply stations with which we have a guaranteed supply agreement. The data centers’ machine rooms are all above ground, air-condition sealed with backup refrigeration systems and the refrigerators, cooling tower, and ice pond form an efficient cooling cycle. This allows the machine room servers to provide a suitably stable environment. This is joined with a ventilation system that under favorable weather conditions can to a great extent lower the data centers’ PUE .

  • Trusted security

    Security

    We guarantee that your client data is secure. Azure has adopted a series of reliable security technologies and practices that help ensure that Azure infrastructure can respond to attacks and protect users’ access to the Azure environment. Moreover, encrypted communication, threat management, and countermeasures (including recurring testing against infiltration) assist in ensuring client data is secure. Industry leading security technology and practices ensure client data confidentiality, integrity, and availability, guarantee that we exceed 99.99% a month of our Service Level Agreement with financial guarantees, and provide up to 6 data backups.

  • Privacy protection

    You have to control your client data. Client permission management of your client data and permissions decides the storage position of client data. No one can use client data without permission. Different tenant client data is logically completely separate and client data cannot be used for advertising or other commercial purposes.

  • Compliance

    We comply with global and national standards. We satisfy international and industry specific standard ISO/IEC27001 and Ministry of Public Security information system security protection evaluation 3rd level filing, as well as multiple trusted Microsoft Azure Cloud Services certifications. Rigorous third party audit and inspection of Azure satisfies different standards of compulsory security controls. We promise transparency and you can request our third party audit results in order to verify our numerous security controls.

  • Transparency

    We know how your client data is stored and accessed and how to protect it. We were the first to push out a public service dashboard to provide a transparent and trusted service guarantee. Through accessible tools and simple, direct language, we transparently reveal how client data is stored, who can access it, and the methods 21Vianet uses to protect client data. With 21Vianet managed Microsoft Azure, we can assist clients in getting better control of their client data. Clients will clearly know where their client data is stored and how client data is used, managed, and protected.

  • Flexible and open

    Azure is an open platform - support is extensive and includes open-source software and systems in server operating systems, various programming languages, frameworks, software packages, development tools, database and client premises equipment. For example, it runs with Docker integrated Linux containers, connects to MySQL, Redis PaaS services, and uses JavaScript, Python, .Net, PHP, Java, and Node.js development applications. It can generate to backend iOS, Android and Windows equipment. With the guiding principle that ”Microsoft Loves Open Source”, Azure Cloud Services supports hundreds of different technologies that developers and IT professionals trust and rely on. Along with the Azure Engineering Team and in close cooperation with the open source community, the Microsoft Open Source Technology Center provides clients with best-in-class tools and technology for design work, development, deployment, and administration of Microsoft Azure Cloud Services and apps, ensuring investment in current technology and training.

  • Economically efficient

    We offer the most favorable pricing to provide you excellent service. Based on each individual service, and according to different configurations, different levels, and pricing separately, we will satisfy your diverse and multiple levels of business needs according to usage and charging separately according to usage time. At the same time, we still provide completely cost-free services: for example processing and Active Directory. Become an Azure PIA customer, you can enjoy up to 99.99% SLA (Service Level Agreement).. You can rapidly deploy infrastructure and services to fully meet all of your enterprise needs, help you reduce saving operating costs and allow you concentrate on your core business.
